verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> more than all the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Glorious <S%H3513>things<s%> are <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of <S%H5892>you<s%>, O city of <S%H430>God<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> and <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to them that <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H6429>me<s%>: behold Philistia, and <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, with <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>; this man was born <S%H3205>there<s%>.
And of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%>, This and that <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> in <S%H5945>her<s%>: and the highest himself shall establish <S%H3559>her<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5608>count<s%>, when he writes <S%H3789>up<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that this man was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5542>there<s%>. Selah.
As well the <S%H7891>singers<s%> as the <S%H2490>players<s%> on instruments shall be <S%H4599>there<s%>: all my springs are in you.
